SEARCH
Package org.opengis.metadata.citation

Interface CitationDate

@Classifier(DATATYPE) @UML(identifier="CI_Date", specification=ISO_19115) public interface CitationDate
Reference date and event used to describe it.
Since:
2.0

    • getDate

      @Profile(level=CORE) @UML(identifier="date", obligation=MANDATORY, specification=ISO_19115) Date getDate()
      Reference date for the cited resource.
      Upcoming API change â€” temporal schema
      The return type of this method may change in GeoAPI 4.0 release. It may be replaced by a type matching more closely either ISO 19108 (Temporal Schema) or ISO 19103.
      Returns:
      reference date for the cited resource.
